title: 3D & CGI
intro: Whether you’re after a single 3D graphic or several minutes of animation, you can use our creative resources to make your ideas come to life.

paragraph.text: Whether you’re after a single 3D graphic or several minutes of animation, you can use our creative resources to make your ideas come to life.
Not only can we produce images and videos in motion, our skilled professionals can take our 3d designs and produce a real, physical object using 3D printing.
Whatever the size and scope of your budget, we’re certain we can produce digital creations that will help you to stand out against the rest.
CGI is a fantastic way to create high quality, realistic illustrations and animations to visualise any concept.
These digital creations can be animated and used in art, printed media, video gaming, films, television programmes, commercials, promotional videos, and simulators.

Digital characters can be used for videos, websites, promotional literature. Our computer design services allow us to create everything needed to bring your company mascots or characters to life for story telling.
The most effective way to encourage prospective buyers is to offer them a striking preview of your future developments. Our visualisations can also aid planning applications.

At Heckford, we create technically accurate 3D models of your development, including landscape visualisation, giving a real sense of the final outcome. We can develop the models to produce animated walkthroughs and take virtual ‘photographs’ before any actual construction work has begun.

Whether for television advertising, in-house training presentations, or YouTube, Heckford have years of experience developing the most effective animations, designing and developing storyboards and scripts, and incorporating voice overs and incredible audio treatment.
A concept is often the most important asset in your possession. We have the tools and knowledge to develop your initial thoughts into something amazing.
We have a large team of artists and designers, with a range of skills and differing knowledge bases, which allows us to utilise each and every person on a number of different projects.
Got an idea in mind? Contact us today to see how we can develop your concept even further.

title: EXHIBITIONS
intro: Creating the right impression for your business. Inspire your customers to use your services and stand out from your competitors.

paragraph.text: We’re one of the UK’s leading providers of exhibition stands, with an award-winning track record in design, build, and event management for leading brands across the UK, Europe and the United States.

From initial design, print and build, right through to the exhibition day, our highly skilled and dedicated print team are reliable, and with over 4 decades of experience, they have a reputation for the quality of their workmanship. Our committed account managers and installers work hand in hand closely with clients to get the look, structure and layout intended.
Our digital marketing executives can also utilise the event on your social media platforms for maximum exposure.

From portable exhibition equipment, through to modular and custom build stands, from start-up companies to multi-nation businesses, we can provide you with the guidance and solution you need. Get in touch and let’s get creative!
First impressions are the most lasting. The perception of your company at exhibition and trade shows starts at around 10 metres away, with only a few seconds to attract key perspective buyers.
Visitors of exhibitions attend with the intention of discovering your brand and services. If your exhibition space attracts consumers, that’s half of the job ticked off.
We are continually investing in the latest technology to attract visitors and encourage them to interact with your display.
Modular exhibition stands, otherwise known as modular trade show displays, are a more affordable alternative to custom built stands, whilst still providing a great return of investment.
Modular stands can be configured to your specifications and fit numerous different layouts from one set of components.
Our range of modular display systems consists of a series of unique frame profiles, components and accessories. These have been designed to offer the most flexible display configurations.
Our banners and pop up stands provide you with a large display area for maximum exposure. They can be seen from a distance and offer the simplicity of assembly and transport.
Our range of banner stands cater for all sizes from 600mm to 1200mm wide and are very competitively priced, along with our 48 hour turnaround time to help cater for the most demanding situation.
New to this? We also have exhibition starter kits in place, offering great value deals on banner stands, pop ups, plinths and leaflet dispensers.
Heckford have travelled the world installing bespoke exhibition stands; from Amsterdam and Dubai, to Glasgow and Guernsey. There’s nowhere we won’t travel to install.

With over 35 years of production experience, we ensure our clients receive the very best personal service. Our expert installation teams are fully trained with PASMA and CSCS certifications, ensuring that your new installation is built safely and on time.
Our creative design team, build team and manufacturing facilities are all in-house, meaning the process is smooth from concept to completion.
Co-ordinating creation, direction and planning are what make clients keep returning to Heckford for their exhibition needs.
From initial stages, right through to the event day, we are there to make sure everything runs smoothly.

We can even guide you through the promotion of your exhibition stand via social media campaigns – creating a buzz and networking with attendees and fellow exhibitioners for maximum impact and exposure.

title: DESIGN & PRINT
intro: The ultimate combination, creative design and cost effective print. Providing cost effective solutions, on time and on budget.

paragraph.text: As a full-service agency, we deliver all your creative design & print needs.

Our talented team of designers are focused on creating seamless concepts, whilst our skilled print-room team make use of our state of the art printers and routers to produce quality end products, from pocket-sized brochures to large-scale signage.
Our graphic designers have the ability to communicate your message through the use of type, space and imagery.
Our specialists produce attention grabbing and beautifully designed advertisements and publications.
We have a wide range of sectors that we’ve worked with from automotive to zoos; check out our case studies to see some of the graphic design work we’ve completed.
It is a remarkable thing to see the journey a creative design takes from the initial visuals right through to a commercially viable design.
Our creatives sometimes have to be “mental athletes” – creating concepts across a range of sectors as diverse as tourism, education, construction and local authorities.
The design and arrangement of type is a vital component in getting your message and brand identity across to your audience.
Layout of type is a specialised discipline involving the design, letter spacing and use of typefaces, from calligraphy to the ever-developing use of digital type.

The consistent use of visual elements including imagery, typeface and colour can influence the perception of a brand, and by applying our creative principals to your corporate identity, we ensure that your brand creates the maximum impact across every print and advertising media.

title: DIGITAL
intro: Taking your message to the world, with imaginative, highly measureable and effective online marketing.

paragraph.text: Digital marketing is a highly measurable and interactive strategy that has become an essential tool for businesses to reach and convert leads.
We build up relevant and impressive online content that will not only improve your SEO, but let your social network platforms become worthwhile, successful marketing tools.
With the ability to write for any tone of voice, we can create attention-grabbing content in a way that will increase the visibility of your business on the web.

As a full-service digital design agency, we can build your website from scratch, optimise your current site to ensure you are getting the best out of it, and introduce you to the latest digital technology such as Mobile App building.

Have no time for social media? We can take care of that too. Our digital marketing executives can keep your online feeds up to date with great content and explore advertising options to target the people you need.
Heckford are proud Google Partners with fully certified Google Adwords specialists that will manage your Pay-Per-Click campaigns daily and report back to the highest standard.
After a free consultation, we will create a bespoke package for the services you need, helping you get the best out of your budget.
Managing social media platforms can be very time consuming. If you’re serious about your brand, you need to be part of it.
This must-have digital marketing strategy creates brand awareness, builds relationships, gains website traffic and boosts your ROI.

There isn’t a platform we don’t know. Whether you’re on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Instagram, YouTube, Pinterest, Tumblr, LinkedIn or Snapchat our experts will keep your online profiles current by publishing content, sharing comments, providing customer care, as well as interacting and engaging directly to potential consumers.
Don’t worry, if you’re completely in the dark, we can explore what works best for your business and set those profiles up for you.

With platforms clamping down on organic reach, it’s important to boost and optimise your posts for maximum impact and interaction. By implementing social media advertising campaigns, we can use our skilled knowledge of targeting methods to attract your desired audience and gain the most relevant results.

As well as receiving meaningful feedback from your customers and fulfilling your marketing objectives, we will provide detailed analytical reports, so you will have a complete understanding of your investment and how you can best utilise the data to optimise future strategies.
Let’s kickstart your social media marketing strategy today.
One website, many devices.

The online buying process has changed dramatically in recent years as more people than ever are choosing to search and shop online. The first thing they see is your website, first impressions really do count.
Whether your objective is to gain leads or make online sales, getting your visitors from A to B needs to be a seamless journey – especially to lockdown those impulse buyers.
Our experts at Heckford can build your website completely from scratch or develop existing sites, so you can provide an easy and enjoyable user experience.

Why is responsive design so important? It’s vital for your website to work across a wide range of devices in order to drive traffic and achieve sales easily. As smartphone and tablet usage increases, so does the importance of mobile friendly websites.
The progression of technology is constantly moving. Let us ensure your online presence is clear to read, easy to navigate and compatible with all screen sizes.
Take a look at the websites we have already created and get in touch to see what we can do for you.

Search engine optimisation is an extremely important part of online marketing, helping to drive relevant traffic to your website, increase authority, and boost site visibility within search engines. SEO is no longer about ranking the highest amongst your competitors, but about driving the most relevant traffic that is more likely to convert.

Our great team of SEO specialists will create great content that is interesting, relevant and authoritative. Having content like this is not just about style, it also leads to search engine success. Google, Yahoo and Bing only show web pages that deserve to be shown in its search results.
Using a range of clever methods and tactics, SEO is much more cost effective compared to other forms of online marketing to drive your online presence.
Your business needs to have an SEO strategy, as it is one of the most crucial factors in online branding and presence.
Email marketing campaigns are the perfect way of drawing in more website traffic, without weeks of preparation and board meetings.
Through email, you can keep your most valuable users in the loop, from exclusive offers, to announcing a launch day, or requesting feedback.

It is imperative that your emails target the right audience in a clever and creative way to ensure that it is opened, read, and receives a successful click-through rate. We produce brilliant designs that entice and excite your customers, giving them more reason to click through to your website or enter a competition.

Email is still one of the most effective and consistent ways to reach a select audience with a direct message. Our talented team will work together to manage your contacts, design, send emails and track results, so that you can quickly reap the rewards.

We also take care of SMS / MMS messaging campaigns. Your business can explore marketing solutions and distribute multimedia content such as music, video or animations. This marketing strategy is great for reaching a large number of people in such a short time. The nature of mobile means messages can be forwarded on, expanding the value and reach of your latest promotion.
You don’t have long to make the right impression, it’s important to give your audience creative and engaging content to make sure they stick around and explore what you have to offer.
Content marketing isn’t just limited to your blog or news section; you need to ensure that your entire website is consistent and helpful throughout.
Here at Heckford, we realise the significance of adhering to the search engines’ algorithms, to ensure that your website gains the most relevant traffic possible.

Blogging is a great way for your brand to connect with your audience. Blog articles are proven to boost traffic to sites, increase brand awareness, and encourage others to share your message to a much wider network.

People enjoy seeing what goes on in the inner workings of companies and venturing behind the scenes. Whether you are developing a new product, celebrating an achievement, welcoming a new member of staff or having a bit of fun, your audience will feel part of your brand’s journey and develop a personal connection.
Not sure how to achieve this?
We can help you update your blog regularly with high quality, relevant content. This gives you the opportunity to become visible for search terms that your static pages may not target.

title: ADVERTISING
intro: In the right place, at the right time, a good idea is made great with effective advertising campaigns.

paragraph.text: As one of the biggest leading agencies in Lancashire, when businesses hear the name ‘Heckford’, they know they’re in the right hands when it comes to advertising.

Advertising is still one of the most effective methods of relaying your message and it’s buried deep in the foundations of everything we do; it’s where we started four decades ago and, thanks to the excellent reputation we have built, it’s where we’ve continued to grow.
We are exceptionally experienced when it comes to negotiating the best advertising rates for our clients.

From local press to the nationals, trade publications to mainstream magazines, our media buyers work tirelessly to make sure you get the best deals, appear in the best positions, and develop media strategies that really generate results.
It might seem easy to attract candidates to a job, but you don’t just want any candidate.

Heckford can provide everything you need to attract the highest quality candidates – from LinkedIn advertising, carefully targeted social media campaigns and posts on online newspapers, to the more traditional route of printed press and magazines – whether they are in local, national or specialist business publications.
From a single vacancy to a factory to fill, we can help you get the best people for the job, for the best price.
There is always a huge sense of pride when you spot your company’s advertisement in public; we know because we feel it too.
From posters to digital billboards, we are committed to providing top quality designs and unparalleled value for our clients.
From live TV to catch-up, our media buying team have the knowledge, experience and statistics to place your advertisements in the best place at the right time for your target audience.
Just like remembering the lyrics to a pop song, radio advertisements have the ability to subconsciously imprint on a person’s mind.
From writing a script to buying air space, we can guide you through the makings of a catchy radio ad and make sure it is heard.
Direct mail takes your business’ offers, values and branding right to your potential customers’ doorsteps.
We have talented artists at hand who manage to turn the briefest of ideas into an impressive reality. Put them to the test with your next direct mail campaign.

title: ILLUSTRATION
intro: Illustration solutions for advertising and publishing. From quirky characters and abstract concepts to photo realism.

title: SIGNAGE
intro: Let’s get you turning heads with our efficient and effective range of interior or exterior signage solutions.

title: PPC / ADWORDS
intro: We have Google AdWords Certified Professionals creating compelling and effective campaigns that maximise your ROI.

title: PHOTOGRAPHY
intro: Our experienced photographers are dedicated to creating outstanding studio or location images for every use.
